#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;
const int INF = 2e9;
typedef pair<int, int> ii;

const int N = 100005; 
vector<int> g[N];
int d[N], n, m, k;
bool was[N];

void dfs(int u) {
  was[u] = true;
  for(int v : g[u]) {
    --d[v];
    if(!was[v] && d[v] < k) dfs(v);
  }
}

int main() { 
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
  cin.tie(NULL);
  cin >> n >> m >> k;
  for(int i = 0, u, v; i < m; ++i) {
    cin >> u >> v;
    g[u].push_back(v);
    g[v].push_back(u);
    ++d[u];
    ++d[v];
  }

  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) if(!was[i] && d[i] < k) {
    dfs(i);
  }
  int ans = 0;
  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) if(!was[i]) ++ans;
  cout << ans << "\n";

  return 0;
}
